description: Allows the user to create and manipulate strings. The strings are typically invisible but can be made visible.

abilities.description: First time in the anime where Doflamingo's strings are actually visible on screen, shown striking a flock of seagulls.

keyMoments.title: First Visible Ito Ito no Mi Strings
keyMoments.description: This episode marks the first time in the anime where Doflamingo's strings are actually visible on screen.
keyMoments.significance: Provides viewers with visual confirmation of the Devil Fruit's powers that were previously only hinted at.
